1.text: Push the flat side of a knife on the clove to loosen the peel.

2.text: Pull the peel off of the garlic clove.

3.text: Smash a whole head of garlic if you need several cloves.

4.text: Trim off the dry stem end of the clove.

5.text: Slice the clove into thin pieces.

6.text: Turn the knife 90-degrees to cut the garlic into pieces.

7.text: Keep chopping if you want minced garlic.
